metadata.title: CVE-2018-20360 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the sbr_process_channel function of libfaad/sbr_dec.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to denial of service. It was discovered that Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 incorrectly handled certain mp4 files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: faad2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
